source.name: Question 4
source.instructions:
Given the following description of each DNS server in the hierarchy, match the DNS server type according to the following order:
1. Highest level of the DNS hierarchy, knows how to reach servers responsible for a given domain (e.g., *.com, *.edu).
1. Replies to DNS query requested by a local user. Requesting all other DNS servers to answer the query on behalf of the user.
1. Responsible for a domain (e.g., *.com, *.edu); knows how to contact authoritative name servers.
1. Provides hostname to IP mappings for organizationâ€™s domain.

answers.answer: Root-level, local DNS, TLD DNS, authoritative DNS
TLD DNS, Root-level, local DNS, authoritative DNS
Root-level, local DNS, authoritative DNS, TLD DNS
local DNS, Root-level TLD DNS, authoritative DNS
